casebody.data:
Otis BERMERS, Appellant, v. A. C. ADERHOLD, Warden, United States Penitentiary, Atlanta, Georgia, Appellee. No. 7186. Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Oct. 6, 1934. In forma pauperis. Otis Bermers, of Atlanta, Ga., in pro. per. Lawrence S. Camp, U. S. Atty., H. T. Nichols, Sp. Atty., and I. K. Hay, Asst. U. S. Atty., all of Atlanta, Ga., for appellee.

Before BRYAN, HUTCHESON, and WALKER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed.
